channel.title: [PROGRAM]Core Shop Maker[PROGRAM]
channel.description:
[center]BUILD 1.0.6.8 RC[/center] [left][size=35pt]Source Code Is Now 85% Complete As Of February 6,2010 9:45 P.M Eastern Time[/size][/left]
Contact Information [email="snwspeckle@gmail.com"]snwspeckle@gmail.com[/email]
DOWNLOAD LINK =====> http://bit.ly/ab2cqC
This is a shortened link!
I am using sharecash, sorry but I am currently low on money to buy essential software to keep designing. Please just click skip to download.
Information This is my Shop Maker That I created in Visual Basic. I find it very useful when I need to make a quick shop and I don't want to go through all the trouble of doing edits and finds. This is a [size=18pt]CLEAN[/size] program. You will though notice that is RC version. This version only shows off its sleek interface. I will plan on releasing my first working build soon. Please download and give me some ideas and user feedback on how it is. This is not a working program yet!
If you are in belief of this program being a virus please scan it to ensure. I am sure this is no virus because I have scanned it with a few scanners.
VIRUS SCAN REPORT [i]File Info[/i]
Report date: 6.2.2010 at 23.41.57 (GMT 1) File name: CoreShopMaker.exe File size: 331264 bytes MD5 Hash: 2e04d03a99e312b1f181898c295d73ff SHA1 Hash: 60F9856492EE0AB34CF572BEBDF56FD6F1B1CD3A Detection rate: 0 on 20 Status: CLEAN
[i]Detections[/i]
a-squared - - Avira AntiVir - - Avast - - AVG - - BitDefender - - ClamAV - - Comodo - - Dr.Web - - F-PROT6 - - G-Data - - Ikarus T3 - - Kaspersky - - McAfee - - NOD32 - - Panda - - Solo Antivirus - - Sophos - - TrendMicro - - VBA32 - - VirusBuster - -
[i]Scan report generated by [url=http://novirusthanks.org]NoVirusThanks.org[/url][/i]
[url=http://i884.photobucket.com/albums/ac45/snwspeckle/scan-report2.png]http://i884.photobucket.com/albums/ac45/snwspeckle/scan-report2.png[/url]
[IMG]http://i884.photobucket.com/albums/ac45/snwspeckle/scan-report2.png[/img]

Please do not post that kind of feedback if you have never used the program.
[/quote]

read my title. S-E-N-I-O-R M-E-M-B-E-R

that basically means I know what I think of it before I’ve even run it

Btw ur interfaces are shit[/quote]
If you have 0 rep you really shouldnt really say your SENIOR MEMBER.

GJ Mate but you need to improve your coding you may want to message me for additional help.
BTW VB2008 IS FREE YOU DONT NEED CASH TO DEVELOP ON IT!

Miss Silabsoft:

source code would help this post 100 fold.

Miss Silabsoft, VB 2008 is a completely different Language, If he uses multiple,
Windows it may take him around 1hour to copy his source code out to a notepad / site.
But it is a simple process. Its quite easy to learn.

Read full topic
